        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="51016" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="51016" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.23</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="1046">1,046</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="147"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Attrape-RÃªves</b> by <b>Louis Vuitton</b> is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. <b>Attrape-RÃªves</b> was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Jacques Cavallier Belletrud. Top notes are Litchi, Ginger and Bergamot; middle notes are Peony, Turkish Rose and Cacao; base note is Patchouli. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>The house of Louis Vuitton is launching a new addition to the women's Les Parfums Louis Vuitton collection - the fragrance called Attrape-RÃªves ("Dream Catcher") - inspired by unexpected and magical experiences like witnessing a large meteor shower.</p>

<p>To capture the experience of euphoria and dreams of exciting adventures, perfumer Jacques Cavallier Belletrud chose the olfactory direction of the composition as "explosive, lively and surprising."Â </p>

<p>Top notes: bergamot, ginger, lychee<br />
Heart: peony, cocoa flower, Turkish rose<br />
Base: patchouli essenceÂ </p>

<p>Louis Vuitton Attrape-RÃªves will be available in quantities of 100 and 200 ml Eau de Parfum from mid-September 2018. The perfume can also be stored in a leather box crafted in the Louis Vuitton workshops, marked with initials of your choice.Â </p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color:                     Peonies overpower other notes

                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                            <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-up"></i>
                                 </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">0</span></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">26</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Powdery start that may remind some of Chanel No. 19 Poudre
                </div>
                    </div>
    </div>
</div>

</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.155.jpg" style="width: 4.35rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Peony-155.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Peony</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.99686027484896; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.105.jpg" style="width: 3.975rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Rose-105.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Turkish Rose</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.92323619588367; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.135.jpg" style="width: 3.45rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cacao-Pod-135.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cacao</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.96720444101136; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.34.jpg" style="width: 3.75rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Patchouli-34.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Patchouli</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="51016"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='de8613efb0658000f8c12678b44f5b26751' slotpayload='{"ct":"3ZJOZDidEI\/VtLX1sj1BBvDhcKBRsPg+0ftO1q6TyohV16z+W7p0gmFqdERfG3mQNnv9KLiSiLRn+ISef2px4ZH3NyW0cWg94KEH\/nEZw9YZJho49kttUZrIihnWBZaPPHSpc7evaBHNI+PSOhaDGfhtQDB1\/ee\/6ep4y8wiGmSg\/uBSLGST4ZsYEHGJu+dAm8Trbr3MYE7ATrA6Jm+7MIrrKR2TCUTO0hBRK43+eSD7CfcS1Qn6gDEm\/ZTX6+e6enC655cB0uBVC82cnApENFZpO2cXu66hKfjKOciB5ZHeOYEPkwxuwOPPyp+rlNyI","iv":"34764f05176d5b20db2c8f58150c067e","s":"1ce3322ab76fa644"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

  <span>
    This perfume reminds me of
  </span>
</div>
<div class="carousel">
            <div class="carousel-cell">
            <a href="">
                <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.67702.jpg" alt="Into The Night Bath & Body Works">
                <span class="brand">Bath & Body Works</span>
                <br>Into The Night
            </a>
        </div>
            <div class="carousel-cell">

                <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.38914.jpg" alt="Mon Paris Yves Saint Laurent">
                <span class="brand">Yves Saint Laurent</span>
                <br>Mon Paris
            </a>
        </div>
            <div class="carousel-cell">
            <a href="">
                <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.39070.jpg" alt="Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming Dior">
                <span class="brand">Dior</span>
                <br>Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming
            </a>
        </div>
            <div class="carousel-cell">
            <a href="">
                <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.57900.jpg" alt="Into the Night Bath & Body Works">

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2338499" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xth3hoff"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2204376"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="xth3hoff" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Y-Eau-de-Parfum-50757.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50757.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Y Eau de Parfum"title="Y Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2338499ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2338499" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2204376">xth3hoff</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-05">11/05/24 00:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>best women's fragrance in my opinion</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2338499"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2338499#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2335391" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2335391" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stefani valini"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250908"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1250908.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stefani valini" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Delina-43871.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43871.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delina"title="Delina"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2335391ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2335391" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250908">stefani valini</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-02">11/02/24 04:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a fruity floral, almost soapy scent. Lychee and peony are the main notes, but patchouli is quite strong as well. The opening is similar to Mon Paris, but changes to a completely different scent. a more complex and mature fragrance. <br />
I can understand those who say it's a more generic scent, but I am not totaly agree.  For a high-end perfume, I think its overprice, but it's beautiful and it's still a little something special.  I think it's the mixture of patchouli and spices. It gives a slightly more original result than if we had only kept the fruits and flowers. The soapiness and spices add a little Je ne sais quoi.<br />
<br />
I imagine an accomplished, yet energetic and fun woman wearing this perfume</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2335391"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2335391#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318353" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2318353" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Stoicchild"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416393"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1416393.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Stoicchild" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Davidoff/Cool-Water-Reborn-For-Her-Eau-de-Parfum-Intense-95268.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95268.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cool Water Reborn For Her Eau de Parfum Intense"title="Cool Water Reborn For Her Eau de Parfum Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2318353ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2318353" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416393">Stoicchild</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 00:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's kinda dense due to the Patchouli note in the dry down. <br />
<br />
This is a Rose scent that you should never overspray, it can be suffocating. It's kinda jammy.<br />
<br />
This isn't a hot weather Rose scent. It's definitely a cool weather Rose. <br />
<br />
It's nice, but not for me. It's too perfumy, like Jovan Black Musk. <br />
<br />
I once got that as a gift but never used it. This smells very similar.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2318353"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2318353#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2306238" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EP712"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044041"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2044041.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EP712" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2306238ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2306238" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044041">EP712</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-05">10/05/24 17:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>â¨Follow https://www.instagram.com/ep_frags/ for more reviews â¨<br />
<br />
Instagram: ep_frags<br />
<br />
Attrape-RÃªves by @louisvuitton is my favorite feminine scent from LV. It is very fresh, rosy, and fruity scent. It opens with a vibrant burst of lychee and bergamot with  gentle accord of peony. The turkish rose then blooms and gives it completely floral touch. It fruitiness reminds me of Rouge Trafalgar by @dior and floral scent reminds me of Delina La RosÃ©e by @parfumsdemarly<br />
<br />
Attrape-RÃªves offers excellent longevity, easily lasting through the day without overpowering the senses. The sillage is moderate but noticeable and it is a compliment getter. This fragrance is versatile enough to be worn during both day and night. Its bright, sparkling notes make it perfect for spring and summer, and the deeper floral and patchouli elements are perfect for winters.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2296136"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2296136#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2294561" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2294561" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Itcannotalwaysbenight"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416320"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1416320.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Itcannotalwaysbenight" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Celine/Zouzou-92290.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92290.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Zouzou"title="Zouzou"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2294561ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2294561" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416320">Itcannotalwaysbenight</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-25">09/25/24 07:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simplicity at its finest... feminine, floral, and sweet - Attrape Reves is a straightforward fruity-floral without all the synthetic musks, iso-e molecules, and ambroxans that are far too prevalent in the industry as of late. As others have mentioned this is a common floral-fruity combo however the quality is what sets this apart from the lesser expensive designer/generic offerings. <br />
<br />
If you are buying authentic LV, there should be no issues with performance whatsoever. This stuff survives showers and laundering if you overspray.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2294561"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2294561#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282723" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282723" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfumelovere"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196236"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfumelovere" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282723ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282723" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196236">perfumelovere</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-14">09/14/24 11:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I smelled it for the first time today from my stylist and while I find it pretty, I surely wouldn't pay full price. DUA makes a dupe in an extrait version if you're that interested in this particular scent but to me it is a standard fruitchouli with fruit top notes, rose middle notes and patchouli base notes which has been done to death. I love my fruitchoulis but already have Armani Si, Miss Dior Cherie and Mon Paris so I don't need this one also.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2282723"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2282723#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2274206" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2274206" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RobNadler"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1419863"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="RobNadler" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2274206ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2274206" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1419863">RobNadler</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-06">09/06/24 21:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was in Las Vegas looking for a sample of another LV fragrance for my wife and I smelled Attrape-Reves (Dream Catcher for those who donât speak French). I canât put my finger on it, but I was really drawn to it. I asked for a sample and was told they were out. Being in Las Vegas with a LV store on every block, I visited a few looking for a sample. One salesperson looked at me sideways and explained it was a womanâs perfume. I guess I understand why it might appeal more to women, but I caught myself smelling my wrist and explaining that they could label it however they wanted to, but I really liked it. <br />
<br />
True story: my 6th LV store (in The Venetian) is where this story ends. Me, a 55 year old man and my two 20-something sons, were treated with so much respect. The salesperson (I think her name was Rachel) was wonderful. I told her the story of the comments in other stores and how much I loved this frag. She said she thought she had a sample and came back with not one but two samples. And bottles of Evian for the 3 of us. <br />
<br />
Iâm sorry she didnât get the sale. I wore it for weeks and finally bought a bottle a couple of weeks ago. My wife and I have about 50-60 frags, and we love many of them. For me, this is one of only a few that I catch myself smelling my wrist in appreciation. <br />
<br />
As for all the comments about it being âregularâ, I couldnât disagree more. I love it. Womenâs perfume or not.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2274206"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2274206#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2267718" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2267718" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Abry_81"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1353338"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1353338.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Abry_81" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2267718ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2267718" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1353338">Abry_81</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-31">08/31/24 23:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Exquisite perfume, very well created but unfortunately it carries the curse of resembling many other fragrances, say Coco Mademoiselle (in all its variants) Miss Dior 2012 and its respective edt from 2013 and all the perfumes that made that DNA so fashionable with the musky and citrus rose-patchouli combo, I must also make the note that although it is reminiscent of all those, it is not so similar, this one is less musky and the citrus note is replaced by the fruity acidity of the lychee, which also bathes that  combo of rose (in this case Turkish) with patchouli but here the floral and feminine part is reinforced with the peony and its characteristic "pink" nuance. This floral part feels effervescent and it must be due to the touch of ginger and a sweetness in the background that begged to be that cocoa that I don't detect (more like cocoa butter) or an undeclared vanilla touch.<br />
Less earthy than Coco Mademoiselle and much less musky and citric than the Miss Dior (in addition to lacking the "screaming" part that jasmine brings to the Dior) this is a fragrance that can captivate anyone who likes these fashionable DNA at the beginning of the 2000s but also to those who don't because it has its twist, you can feel the good hand (and nose) of Jacques Cavallier and the quality components that he uses for LV and although many of the freshest ones are very moderate This is "felt" in the right conditions, I think it would work all year round except extreme heat and extreme winter and it will be a delight for many women and for some men (why not) who like me do not deprive themselves of using scents that they like regardless of the gender with which the market insists on labeling some aromas, a guilty pleasure for those lovers of the already classic Chanel and the discontinued and thousand-times reformulated Dior.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2267718"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2267718#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2252224" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1598503">Maliken</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-07">08/07/24 14:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful fruity floral mix of rose and litchi that made me think of Delina by Parfums de Marly, albeit far less loud and shouty. It develops nicely and that fruity, floral combination starts to recede after a few hours to give way to a smooth cacao and patchouli as it dries. Attrape-RÃªves doesn't pack the same punch as Delina, which would still be intensely fruity and floral at the same mark, but to me the LV creation smells a bit more elegant and slightly less juvenile. <br />
<br />
Far too feminine for me to wear personally, but I would find this attractive on any woman.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2242011"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2242011#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2228166" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2159918">Nonchalant_Nat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-24">07/24/24 11:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had high hopes for this fragrance. I like the scent profile but the longevity and sillage at the price point is concerning. I can smell it on my skin after about 6 hours but it does not project for more than 2 hours. I wanted to add a full bottle to my collection but unless I can find one discounted that won't happen.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2228166"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2228166#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220862" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2220862" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Filolek3037"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1571518"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1571518.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Filolek3037" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2220862ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2220862" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1571518">Filolek3037</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-16">07/16/24 22:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So generic and boring and something Iâve smelled 100 times before. Smells like a sweet-fruity cheapie. To my nose it has similar profile to escada and Victorias secret or a more boring and sweeter version of Marc Jacobs daisy. I canât understand the overwhelmingly positive reviews</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2220862"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2220862#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2213034" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2213034" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Trench1419!"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169860"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2169860.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Trench1419!" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Myriad-85363.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85363.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Myriad"title="Myriad"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2213034ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2213034" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169860">Trench1419!</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-09">07/09/24 10:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Attrape-Reves was the third bottle of perfume that I bought from the Louis Vuitton store, and I got it as part of my plan to propose to my fiance, to formally propose.  She has a dreamcatcher tattoo on her back, so I thought this was fitting, and I had a sample of it, Rose des Vents, and Matiere Noire from my previous visit to the Louis Vuitton store.  I just loved the bright, uplifting, fresh, floral, fruity scent in Attrape-Reves, and it does have a little bit of deeper scent notes in the base.<br />
<br />
My fiance ghosted me again a few weeks ago, but I still have the perfume because I had only given her a small decant I made so far.  I've been layering it with Nuit de Feu and Margiela Replica By the Fireplace, and calling it "The night of smokey dreams"; I love how the bright floral notes contrast the animalic notes and the incense and wood fire scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2213034"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2213034#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2201511" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's a great summer scent and could probably work in spring and fall too. Very fruity and floral, I believe it's the only fruity scent LV has (or that's just what they told me). I disagree with other reviews, Attrape-RÃªves has amazing projection and longevity. It's definitely worth it in terms of quality and scent, my taste buds just happened to get sick of it after a couple months.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2177387"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2177387#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2174130" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2174130" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Axenia Kesari"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152341"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2152341.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Axenia Kesari" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2174130ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2174130" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152341">Axenia Kesari</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-31">05/31/24 22:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its a very fresh floral fruity that is light at the same time long lasting. It is floral-litchi with a bit of brightness to it like ice, the rose is faint. <br />
I feel like theres an Ice note for some reason because its so fresh without smelling grassy or minty.<br />
I dont get the ginger the same way in hermes twilly ginger perfumes. <br />
I find this perfect for the day especially in the spring and summer as its very light, uplifting and sweet. Longevity is long on clothes and on hair (12 hrs+) , but on skin I get 4-6 hours because it just dissolves into a very light litchi scent. Sillage is average to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2174130"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2174130#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2171763" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2171763" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="islandgirlmaranda"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1255474"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1255474.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="islandgirlmaranda" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Nettare-di-Sole-66360.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66360.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Allegoria Nettare di Sole"title="Aqua Allegoria Nettare di Sole"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2171763ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2171763" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1255474">islandgirlmaranda</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-29">05/29/24 15:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just picked this up today in LV in Hawaii! After smelling most of their fragrances, I landed on this one! It grabbed me and drew me in! Pacific Chill was too grapefruity, In the Stars was my runner up but it's SO LIGHT. Disappointed in longevity.<br />
I sprayed a few on me in the store, and this one is out-smelling, out-lasting the others BY A MILE. Most of them disappeared quickly but this one is hanging around. It's really beautiful, it does remind me of a sugary berry sweet version of Coco Mademoiselle *EDT.* I used to wear that but found it too patch heavy. This is a sugary cousin to that. This is wearable in heat or cold (it is hot today!) and I feel this would perform great anytime. Sugared berries and a wearable patchouli (fruit-choulie!) I typically despise patchouli in a fragrance but it grounds this one nicely and it isn't overdone, it's in the background and dry down. This reminds me a little bit of B&amp;BW Into the Night as well, as others have said. But this of course is classy and beautiful. I can't wait to get dressed up and wear this! I'm so happy with my trip-souvenir!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2171763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2171763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2170281" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2170281" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BlessedBlossom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2100140"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2100140.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BlessedBlossom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Wulong-Cha-30567.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30567.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="WulÃ³ng ChÃ¡"title="WulÃ³ng ChÃ¡"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2170281ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2170281" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2100140">BlessedBlossom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-28">05/28/24 09:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I agree with the reviews that compare this to Chanel Coco Madmoiselle.<br />
The opening really reminded me of a sweeter, more youthful Madmoiselle!<br />
<br />
I really like this offering from LV, and its their only perfume that Iâve actually used up and decided to repurchase.<br />
<br />
The opening is sweet and i get Coco Madmoiselle, and a honey accord. And then thereâs some softness and something comforting, as you start to smell the Cacao.<br />
<br />
I really dont get any patchouli, nor any granny vibes from this.<br />
Itâs a nice, soft, likeable, sweet scent. <br />
With mediocre projection.<br />
<br />
Its a safe blind buy, I dont see anyone having trouble liking this.<br />
<br />
But if youâre looking for a beast mode fragnance, this is not it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2170281"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2170281#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2168340" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2168340" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="IngriDee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2146135"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="IngriDee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2168340ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2168340" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2146135">IngriDee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-26">05/26/24 08:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just don't get the hype. Smells like when you're walking in Sephora or Douglas. Very generic and boring. Also, the dry down smells like cat pee on me. Gave it to my mum who loves it more than any other fragrance (and she has a few) but have asked not to wear it when I am around.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2168340"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2168340#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2162396" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; So itâs definitely not worth the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2162396"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2162396#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2158106" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Reminds me of Coco Madmoiselle, but a little lighter, fruitier.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2158106"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2158106#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2151749" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2151749" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="heartbeam"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2119696"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2119696.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="heartbeam" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Vanilla-Suede-96257.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96257.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Suede"title="Vanilla Suede"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2151749ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2151749" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2119696">heartbeam</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-10">05/10/24 10:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Kind of reminds me of Penhaligon's Empressa, Mon Paris, Flowerbomb, and La Vie Est Belle. It's really spicy on me, I was expecting more of a fresh perfume. The patchouli is really strong on this one to my nose, so steer clear of this if that's not your thing. I think this is a wearable perfume year-round, but I would only wear it at night because it's too strong to be a daytime perfume on me. Way too expensive of an asking price considering how similar it is to cheaper, more popular fragrances. Not a unique scent profile by any means.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2151749"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2151749#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2132180" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Beautiful</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2111566"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2111566#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2111372" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2111372" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yolis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341217"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1341217.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yolis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Rose-Oud-8070.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.8070.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rose Oud"title="Rose Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2111372ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2111372" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341217">Yolis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 21:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Something about this smells like candy... I smell a fruity juicy lychee mainly with peony, ginger, and rose/patchouli. This doesn't smell powdery candy like LDBS by Kilian nor overly sweet like any caramel/vanilla scent (the cacao in here isn't that pronounced IMO). It's like a fruity candy that isn't sickening. Didn't expect to like it so much but it's so pretty! The scent wafting as you move is so nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2111372"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2111372#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2104750" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2104750" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Storm1980"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1886123"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1886123.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Storm1980" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2104750ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2104750" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1886123">Storm1980</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-26">03/26/24 09:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is a tantalizing blend of fruitiness, sweetness, and refreshing notes, making it the perfect summer companion. The litchi and peony notes is the star here, giving it a unique and captivating quality. I can't wait to wear this gorgeous scent all summer long!  Pacific Chill, City of Stars, California Dream, On The Beach and Afternoon Swim were standout favorites of mine as well. I highly recommend giving them a try for a truly enticing experience!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2104750"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2104750#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2096853" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2096853" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="flyprincess"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224920"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1224920.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="flyprincess" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Prive-Bleu-Lazuli-48059.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48059.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani PrivÃ© Bleu Lazuli"title="Armani PrivÃ© Bleu Lazuli"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2096853ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2096853" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224920">flyprincess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-18">03/18/24 20:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Where is the fragrance?!! I smell barely anything â some fresh peony and veil of patchouli.  Unimpressed. Sad.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2096853"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2096853#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2084260" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2084260" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tanaC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75237"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.75237.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tanaC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2084260ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2084260" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75237">tanaC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-06">03/06/24 11:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Attrape-RÃªves<br />
(150 ml., usd 250, 150 ml. left (2nd hands).<br />
<br />
Ok, so I decide to buy Attrape-RÃªves solely on great price <br />
and it was the scent I have been looking before.<br />
<br />
On my skin I quite doubt how can this be linked with delina.. <br />
I means apart from note list on Fragantica. It is very difference profileâ¦<br />
<br />
Attrape-RÃªves seems to be the common âfeminine patchouli fruity floralâ <br />
kind of fragrance. You may list a few that use this framework. <br />
Angels du Demon Le Parfum, CoCo Mademoiselle, Few Mugler Angle Flanker..<br />
<br />
The opening was something reminds me of sour lemony sorbet with texture. <br />
Mildly spicy. This what I first got from this fragrance.<br />
<br />
Floral heart build up, beautiful. I canât say I got rose because the cocoa accord build along with floral real fast but the floral is definitely there. I think Rosy tone slightly more prominent?<br />
But it is not give me a full rose bloom like.. fully rose fragrance.<br />
<br />
As it scent develop, it quite similar to Black Opium Extreme. The cocoa with patchouli. <br />
Something That is "Tart Touch" still linger. As time pass by Patchouli stronger and <br />
it is combination of those familiar fragrance before.<br />
<br />
The base becomes very earthy patchouli, like a classic fruity-floral-patchouli that Patchouli.<br />
Is really strong and prominent, I quite enjoy patchouli personally. but this is about reaching dizzy level.<br />
<br />
... I test this further a few time, I am enjoying this a bit more everytime I use.<br />
The complexity in this.. uhm.. I can totally say this is "Complex" but complex in the..<br />
How can I say... "Unnecessary" way.<br />
<br />
The tart touch reminds me much of "Good Girl Gone Bad"<br />
The Cocoa touch reminds me much of "Black Opium Extreme"<br />
The Floral Heart reminds me much of "CoCo Mademoiselle"<br />
The very earthy patchouli reminds me much of "Mugler Angle"<br />
<br />
But it bring each element so well and not really interrupting each other.<br />
It is cohesive story-telling and I would give a nice score on that.<br />
<br />
"Attrape-RÃªves" is adult patchouli fragrance will be perfect for Woman in her 35+ and enjoy fragrance<br />
In realm of "High Quality Designer" before, I think provide extra-step.<br />
Like epitome of "Fruity-Floral-Patchouli" as of I am testing now.<br />
Nothing really pass "Attrape-RÃªves"... at the moment I review.<br />
<br />
I think I would rate this 8/10 (Consider the blends).<br />
Yeah, it is not really my thing but I can see the point that this bring<br />
so many magical aspect of "Designer" fragrance in here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2084260"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2084260#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2082349" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
