The post Christmas blues kick in and this little gem lifts my spirits. I prefer it in cooler weather like others have mentioned. This is a big, purple rose (purple rose in the sense of initios atomic rose). I wore this the 3rd trimester of my pregnancy and it brings back all the magical feels for me. Will always have a special place in my heart.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1428862"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1428862#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1427072" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Nice but not something that attracts me due to the strong sweetness and fruitiness. I prefer GG legereâs composition despite the lesser quality.<br />

It has incredible performance. Highly recommended for all ladies who love feminine flowery scents</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1404143"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1404143#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1388317" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A universal scent for all seasons and all genders. Everyone could rock this beauty. I could see this working for every in literally every single setting. Itâs hard to find a scent that is just sweet enough for winter and date nights yet fresh enough for the office and for summer. Perfectly balanced. The best from LV to me.<br />
<br />
Super unique cocoa powder to me with a nice fruity mix from the litchi. The florals give a nice fresh airy vibe. The patchouli grounds it a bit but isnt really noticeable like at all. Itâs sweet, fruity, floral, airy, and so so good! Itâs the equivalent of a nice warm hug ð¥°</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1370296"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1370296#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1369072" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A sweet, fruity floral mixed with spicy ginger, cocoa and earthy patchouli doesnât make this scent groundbreaking or unique, but it remains a happy, super feminine and youthful scent. The opening is bubbly and beautiful, while the drydown remains more muted as the fruity notes disappear. This can transition great from day to night during spring/summer and is beautiful in colder weather too. It is expensive, but you are paying for the exclusivity of wearing a luxury brand.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1362231"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1362231#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1340696" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I can't stand the patchouli in here. It reminds me of so many other mainstream perfumes like YSL Mon Paris, Miss Dior. Ugh. It might be the fruit with the patchouli and peony/rose. It's all the same. Huge disappointment. Save your money and buy Delina if you're looking for a sweet rose.<br />
<br />
I say Delina because the notes are almost exactly the same. The only difference is Delina does NOT contain patchouli. It's much more wearable in my opinion.<br />
<br />
More &amp; more I'm realizing LV is not the best fragrance brand. Dior, TF, etc. are much better if you wanna go down the mainstream luxury brand route.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1339508"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1339508#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1338233" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I ordered every LV sample I could find and this one was one of the ones I was most excited for, which actually made this my biggest disappointment. <br />
<br />
It smells fine. Thatâs it...just fine. It does NOT smell like a fragrance worth Â£200/100ml. There is nothing about Attrape-Reves compared to other sweet, fruitchouli, floral, chocolatey fragrances out there that makes it positively stand out against the rest (seriously the only standout thing is the price). I was going to blind buy a full bottle based on reviews and the notes and thank goodness I trusted my gut to go with a sample instead, I wouldâve been so annoyed with myself lol.<br />
<br />
The scent of Attrape-Reves, to me, is kinda reminiscent of La Nuit TrÃ©sor A La Folie AND La vie est belleâboth which I find preferable to this by far, and also much more affordable.<br />
<br />
Performance is pretty decent on it. Few sprays lasted me all day and I had a good sillage for a few hours, compliments too (never anyone asking what it is though). I canât really fault the performance, but I guess I just had higher expectations based on the price tag and other fragrances from LV that kinda blew me away. <br />
<br />
Iâve loved other LV scents like Afternoon Swim, Cactus Garden, Ombre Nomade and Heures DâAbsence, but just terribly  disappointed by the lack of originality on this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Tried other perfumes with similar notes but nothing comes close to being on this level. I mean itâs Louis Vuitton. This is worth the money; plus bottles are refillable at LV stores for a lesser price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1317855"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1317855#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1316993" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1316993" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="moderndandy_swap"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1289040"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1289040.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="moderndandy_swap" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1316993ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1316993" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1289040">moderndandy_swap</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-31">03/31/21 04:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>WOW, after looking at similar perfumes I thought that it would be just a mainstream fruitchuli, but this one has a good unique twist! Thanks to LV unique watery/leathery DNA, I can clearly see deeper aspect and cacao-ified patchouli straight from heavy-hitters like Nouveau Monde and even Ombre Nomade. This is what Delina Exclusif should have been.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1316993"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1316993#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1315971" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1320042">Mademoiselle B</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-29">03/29/21 10:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume is like a warm, sweet blanket of flowers and something undescribable. On my skin it smells really elegant and I get a lot of compliments on it. As I do not really like sweet scents in warm weather I only wear it, when it gets colder in the fall and winter and it is perfect.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1315971"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1315971#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1282369" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001169">hollandbri</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-26">01/26/21 18:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A youthful fruity floral with dimension. I really enjoy this in the colder weather as it can be a little too sweet for warm weather. The dry down definitely has a softer quality Iâm attributing to the cacao. I wore this the last trimester of my pregnancy so when I smell this it instantly brings me back to that exciting and magical time in my life.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1282369"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1282369#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1278627" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1278627" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="me.and.mrs.jones"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1222714"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="me.and.mrs.jones" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Delina-Exclusif-50370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delina Exclusif"title="Delina Exclusif"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1278627ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1278627" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1222714">me.and.mrs.jones</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-19">01/19/21 16:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Attrape Reves is a beautiful fruity/floral fragrance. Itâs sweet, fresh and smells of the most beautiful flowers. The one is not only fruity, it is grounded by a very warm cacao note, that almost gives it a mildly woody vibe. Attrape Reves is a very pretty scent. Itâs girly, young and playful but far from immature. Think Daisy Eau So Fresh but better, more unique and more expensive. A spring/summer fragrance for sure. <br />
<br />
The longevity is good, however the total performance not so much. The fragrance does not project. I can smell it on me somewhat, but others cannot smell it at a foot away. <br />
<br />
Personally, I like my fragrances to perform exceedingly well, and to project off of me out into the universe.......Like say.....Delina by Parfum de Marly.<br />
<br />
The Packaging is stunning, but at the $265 asking price(usd), I wish it were more of a beast mode fragrance. That would make this perfume absolutely perfect. <br />
<br />
Side note:I think this is a fragrance for people who like perfume, and want to smell nice/luxurious but have not immersed themselves into the niche world yet. Niche lovers like myself, know that performance can be a deal breaker.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1278627"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1278627#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1275235" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/372423">fyetan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-12">09/12/20 20:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Strong fruity start, lychee over patchouli to me. <br />
It stays potent (too potent! This kept smacking me in the face from my one spray on my arm) for the next 2 hours, being more of a fruity peony on patchouli. <br />
<br />
About 3 hours in it is a sweet floral skin scent. <br />
<br />
Definitely fits the LV ads... someone attractive, confident, beautiful would wear this. I personally am very fond of this as I got the sample during my engagement trip to Hawaii, but it doesn't have the uniqueness for me to buy a full bottle. If you don't have a sweet fruity-floral patchouli, this would fit the bill.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1223632"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1223632#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1216296" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243044">thezoeedit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-26">08/26/20 08:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is absolutely gorgeous, to me its a more intense La Vie Est Belle mixed with mademoiselle, the top notes are stunning and lasts a while ... I blind brought this and am over the moon, can see why it translates to "Dream Catcher" ... its so pretty!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1216296"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1216296#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1162165" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; There is something pretty and relatively inoffensive about this one. It is a strong fragrance that is great for the warmer months and has a sweet but long lasting dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1162165"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1162165#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1150564" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; As it settles, it reminds me of Angel by Mugler. I hate that perfume and I hate this one. Itâs over the top and smells like a basic and bad fruity patchouli scent. Hate. Overpriced. Basic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1150564"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1150564#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1096800" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1096800" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragFrog"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/855989"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.855989.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragFrog" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Vodka-on-the-Rocks-23899.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23899.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vodka on the Rocks"title="Vodka on the Rocks"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1096800ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1096800" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/855989">FragFrog</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-11">09/11/19 22:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very sweet, syrupy  and familiar scent . " Expensive and important " perfume  but frankly smells like many other perfumes mentioned below   I will not repeat them but agree with all of the  perfume enthusiasts.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1096800"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1096800#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1095672" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1095672" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="trillav"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1183164"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1183164.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="trillav" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Oud-Bouquet-Eau-de-Parfum-26776.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.26776.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Bouquet Eau de Parfum"title="Oud Bouquet Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1095672ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1095672" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1183164">trillav</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-08">09/08/19 11:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fruitchuli, this took a while to grow on me but yeah it's nice. I get a lot of compliments when I wear it. It's in a similar vein to LVEB and La Nuit Tresor.....but it's more refined. For me La Nuit Tresor is just way too much, it's a bomb. LNT is not really work appropriate imo. It attacks everyone whereas this kindly greets them. LNT is obviously strong and good value for money, but I prefer this because it's not so intense but still leaves a trail. <br />
<br />
Very feminine pretty scent. It's a lot more "clean" smelling than the above two. Quite sharp and crisp whereas LVEB is blended so smoothly you can't really pick out the notes. This reminds me of a clear glass still pond. To me it's not syrupy at all. Syrupy would be Oud Bouquet by Lancome. This is fresh. Not cloying. <br />
<br />
Longevity 10/10 - great longevity no issues here<br />
Sillage 10/10 (projects for around 5 hours, first 2 loudly)<br />
Compliments 10/10 someone always asks what I'm wearing<br />
Versatility 10/10 you could wear this to work although it's a bit loud, great for summer, super crisp for fall and winter also. Goes well with a freshly ironed dress. <br />
<br />
Won't offend anyone but unique enough to warrant a purchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1095672"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1095672#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1078590" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1078590" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Catsylvania"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1199216"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1199216.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Catsylvania" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Poivre-Noir-75836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Poivre Noir"title="Poivre Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1078590ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1078590" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1199216">Catsylvania</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-13">07/13/19 21:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oddly enough, I didn't get much patchouli here because the peonies dominated everything for me. Attrape-Reves, by far, is the most potent perfume I own, and that posed some difficulties.<br />
<br />
My first problem was the sharp and powdery start after the first spray. It did low key remind me of Chanel no.19 poudre but Attrape-Reves is softer (and ofc sweeter!) in its powderiness. Next was that the peonies overpowered every other notes in this fragrance, and the strength of it was so much that the only way I could feel comfortable wearing it was outside somewhere windy. This is by no means to say that the overall scent is bad but the potency and silage didn't do much for me initially.<br />
<br />
However, a few hours later Attrape-Reves seemed to weaken a little, and I could finally see what a lovely composition it is. I could finally smell the touch of rose and a little bit of the spicy ginger. The peonies at last became fresh, velvety and delicate, and that made my overall wearing experience much more enjoyable. The scent appears a bit old fashioned but in a very good sense, and you can easily wear this perfume every day quite easily. <br />
<br />
What I did notice is that over time you become more and more used to it, and you stop noticing the powdery notes, which means that initial sharpness no longer poses an issue. The scent is quite unique, and there is little doubt that you wouldn't stand out while wearing it. While I'm not crazy over Attrape-Reves, I still like it a lot, and I think it's a great balance between retro and modernity.<br />
<br />
Silage: 10/10<br />
Longevity: 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1078590"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1078590#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1068439" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1115483">HouseofKeisha</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-04-22">04/22/19 21:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is beautifully fruity-sweet. Thereâs something about it (apart from the obvious LV brand) that makes it very high end. Maybe the wuality of the notes, I first thought peach was involved due to the fruity-sweetness.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1053587"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1053587#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1038297" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1038297" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="june7rose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/801829"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.801829.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="june7rose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Louis-Marie/No-03-L-Etang-Noir-54110.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54110.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="No.03 L'Etang Noir"title="No.03 L'Etang Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1038297ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1038297" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/801829">june7rose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-03-06">03/06/19 08:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's all right, way too much patchouli for my taste. It's basically a more expensive smelling version of the (unappetizing and ubiquitous in my opinion) fruitchoulis that have taken over the universe like la vie and flowerbomb. I give it complete respect for staying power though. I sprayed it yesterday afternoon and it's still quite evident the next morning.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1038297"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1038297#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent999227" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Lovely, but super boring. Berry-patchouli-gourmand-rose.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="999227"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=999227#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent995708" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc995708" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragrant.regard"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170037"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragrant.regard" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma995708ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd995708" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170037">Fragrant.regard</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-10-29">10/29/18 01:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Less sweet than La Vie est Belle, less cashmeran than Flowerbomb, more citrus pear than Coco; you get the idea. Tons of sugar, vanilla. Suppose the name fits if you dream often of candy shops. The patchouli seems a nicer quality than that in the disastrous candle theyâve just released. <br />
<br />
Commercial. Like a dozen other things. Ridiculously priced. The transparent sprayer is cooler than the fragrance; that is, until you use it, and the refraction magic is lost. Pity they spend money on useless gimmicks. Seems only vanillin and maltol fit into the budget after that.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="995708"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=995708#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent992763" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc992763" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LP2018"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1167127"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LP2018" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/The-Wedding-Silk-Santal-36-83208.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83208.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Wedding Silk Santal | 36"title="The Wedding Silk Santal | 36"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma992763ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd992763" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1167127">LP2018</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-10-19">10/19/18 05:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Iâm really liking this perfume.  Attrape reves is what I would call gourmand light.  It is not overly sweet or cloying and all the notes are beautifully blended.  It starts off fruity and then the flowers join in and finally the patch and cocoa finish it off.  If you like bold scents like Angel and La Vie est Belle you will probably be disappointed.  Where those shout, Attrape reves whispers.  That doesnât mean that people around you canât smell it because Ive been complimented when I wear it.  The quality is definitely there and Iâm enjoying wearing it.  Lasts a long time on my skin and even longer on clothes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="992763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=992763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent992713" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc992713" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="happy888cat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/138505"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.138505.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="happy888cat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/untitled-7865.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7865.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="(untitled)"title="(untitled)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma992713ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd992713" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/138505">happy888cat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-10-19">10/19/18 00:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Notes of Lychee, Rose, Cocoaâ¦ I was imaging a beautiful gourmand like Pierre Hermes' Ispahan macaroon. But now that I've tried it, I will conclude that it is nowhere near.<br />
It is a rather common juicy pink fruit-chouli; instantly recognisable as a sister of Angel, La Vie Est Belle, Valentina, so onâ¦<br />
It has a slightly sour opening thanks to the citrus and lychee (not distinctly identifiable, just a general fruity contribution). Then it develops (not much) into a sweeter, less sour patchouli scent. The cocoa flower is not detectable at all, which is a little disappointing.<br />
Very mediocre I think, and for a third or quarter the asking price I would say dupes are very easy to find.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="992713"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=992713#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent988958" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc988958" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="missingpuzzle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/429992"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.429992.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="missingpuzzle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Wind-Flowers-70182.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70182.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wind Flowers"title="Wind Flowers"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma988958ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd988958" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/429992">missingpuzzle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-10-07">10/07/18 09:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is a noble version of CK Euphoria to me. When it is freshly sprayed, it smells very complex; notes are hardly detectable - the composition is well-blended. Flowers make the scent cheerful and optimistic and do not let the scent become too 'fatale' or wintery. Dry-down is a bit soapy, smells like sakura.<br />
Overall, it is a pleasant fragrance, quite safe and universal, ultra feminine. Sillage is moderate.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="988958"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=988958#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent985062" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It doesnt smell fresh. this is now my least favorite louis vuitton perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="985062"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=985062#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent983067" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Cant wait to try!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="983067"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=983067#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1598738" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1598738" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dommymichelle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1359486"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1359486.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dommymichelle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fragrance-Du-Bois/Sirene-91166.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91166.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="SirÃ¨ne"title="SirÃ¨ne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1598738ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1598738" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1359486">dommymichelle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-07">07/07/22 19:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first splurge fragrance purchase, and entirely on a whim. I received a sample at the flagship Paris store (how bougie!) after making my very first LV purchase several years ago. I took the sample with me to a wedding in Italy (late spring on the Amalfi coast!), and almost every man I came in contact with said "OMG you smell SO GOOD." Like some weird catnip for straight boys, idk. Based on the rave reviews from the opposite sex, I grabbed a bottle before returning home to the US. <br />
<br />
I personally thought it was dreamy and really unique... I haven't smelled anything quite like it (the cocoa-litchi-rose combo is really special!). TBH I'm surprised at the reviews saying this is generic. I digress. For a fragrance with patchouli and cocoa, this is surprisingly fresh. It's VERY powerful, SERIOUS projection â spray too much and you'll get a migraine (I made this mistake, lol). And it really does last. <br />
<br />
I was immediately enamored with this pretty pink potion, and obviously am a sucker for the compliments. If it works with your skin chemistry, and it's your style, it's a beautiful formulation that'll last you a long time and draw some attention. It's seasonless, great for day or night, really elegant and feminine, and youthful.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1598738"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1598738#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1727232" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; the cacao note is so sweet and creamy, and the patchouli compliments that sweetness so nicely, it's a very sexy combination. this works wonders during the summer (when I got the majority of the compliments), but because it's sweet it works during the colder weather just as fine. but I think this fragrance shines best during warmer weather! love it so freaking much, need to get a refill at LV soon. wouldn't say it's a safe blind buy though! go to the store and smell it first!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2274206" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RobNadler"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1419863"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="RobNadler" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2274206ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2274206" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1419863">RobNadler</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-06">09/06/24 21:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was in Las Vegas looking for a sample of another LV fragrance for my wife and I smelled Attrape-Reves (Dream Catcher for those who donât speak French). I canât put my finger on it, but I was really drawn to it. I asked for a sample and was told they were out. Being in Las Vegas with a LV store on every block, I visited a few looking for a sample. One salesperson looked at me sideways and explained it was a womanâs perfume. I guess I understand why it might appeal more to women, but I caught myself smelling my wrist and explaining that they could label it however they wanted to, but I really liked it. <br />
<br />
True story: my 6th LV store (in The Venetian) is where this story ends. Me, a 55 year old man and my two 20-something sons, were treated with so much respect. The salesperson (I think her name was Rachel) was wonderful. I told her the story of the comments in other stores and how much I loved this frag. She said she thought she had a sample and came back with not one but two samples. And bottles of Evian for the 3 of us. <br />
<br />
Iâm sorry she didnât get the sale. I wore it for weeks and finally bought a bottle a couple of weeks ago. My wife and I have about 50-60 frags, and we love many of them. For me, this is one of only a few that I catch myself smelling my wrist in appreciation. <br />
<br />
As for all the comments about it being âregularâ, I couldnât disagree more. I love it. Womenâs perfume or not.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="2274206"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=2274206#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1370296" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A universal scent for all seasons and all genders. Everyone could rock this beauty. I could see this working for every in literally every single setting. Itâs hard to find a scent that is just sweet enough for winter and date nights yet fresh enough for the office and for summer. Perfectly balanced. The best from LV to me.<br />
<br />
Super unique cocoa powder to me with a nice fruity mix from the litchi. The florals give a nice fresh airy vibe. The patchouli grounds it a bit but isnt really noticeable like at all. Itâs sweet, fruity, floral, airy, and so so good! Itâs the equivalent of a nice warm hug ð¥°</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1370296"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1370296#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="51016" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1793871" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="manarasti"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249543"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1249543.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="manarasti" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ex-Nihilo/Lust-in-Paradise-53588.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53588.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lust in Paradise"title="Lust in Paradise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1793871ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1793871" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249543">manarasti</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-27">03/27/23 09:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>High Quality CK Euphoria.<br />
la vie est belle is also a dupe.<br />
it can be labeled as the most overpriced generic perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1793871"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1793871#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1611317" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1611317" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="missmaddiemac"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1344772"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1344772.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="missmaddiemac" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Black-Opium-Nuit-Blanche-34503.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34503.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Opium Nuit Blanche"title="Black Opium Nuit Blanche"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1611317ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1611317" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1344772">missmaddiemac</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-26">07/26/22 22:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my friends raves about this fragrance, and so I had high expectations when I tried it for the first time, but ALL I got was patchouli. I like some patchouli, occasionally. This was not one of those times.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51016"comment_id="1611317"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Attrape-Reves-51016.html?ccid=1611317#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="51016" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="the peak of sensuality. it is not mass appealing at all, the overly musky cinnamon usually scares people away instantly, but then it transforms into this beautiful amalgamation of sweet &amp; spiciness. 8.5/10 , signature scent worthy.">by
            <em>CHESTDAYBABY</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/s.1658356.jpg"

                <!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_vrec_1 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x600" id="fragranticacom_perfume_vrec_1" v-pre>

                <div style="clear:both; height: 1rem;"></div>
    
</div>
    </div>
</div>                        <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Perfumes</span></div>
            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-y grid-margin-x text-center">
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">1.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Khamrah-75805.html" class="en2inter">Khamrah Lattafa Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">2.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Elixir-81642.html" class="en2inter">Le Male Elixir Jean Paul Gaultier</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">3.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/By-Kilian/Angels-Share-62615.html" class="en2inter">Angels&#039; Share By Kilian</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">4.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgH0e5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');

</script>
